catalog.name: api.analyzer
catalog.description: Analyze API specifications for backward compatibility and breaking changes
usage_examples: Analyze API compatibility: Ask Claude to use api.analyzer agent
Generate breaking change report between versions
capabilities: Detect breaking changes between API versions
Suggest migration paths for breaking changes

catalog.name: api.designer
catalog.description: Design RESTful APIs following enterprise guidelines with iterative refinement
usage_examples: Design new API from requirements: Ask Claude to use api.designer agent
Generate OpenAPI spec with Zalando guidelines applied
capabilities: Design RESTful APIs from natural language requirements
Generate OpenAPI 3.1 specs with best practices
Iteratively refine based on validation feedback
